attributes.action: Tighten the law on Those who use Mobile Phones whilst Driving.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new law to try and stop those using Mobile Phones whilst Driving is'nt working. People still do it regularly. Tighten the law with tougher Fines.
Suggest a 2 Year Driving ban and a fine of £1000 if caught driving whilst using a Mobile Phone , and encourage people to use Bluetooth Hnad's free sets.
Driving whilst on a Mobile phone risks lives. Tougher Penalties are needed.
